data.name: web_search
data.description: Search the web for up-to-date information, news, and facts.

query.description: Search query string describing what to look up.

recency_days.description: How many days back to prioritize in the search (e.g. 1 = last 24h, 7 = last week).

max_results.description: Maximum number of search results to retrieve.

data.name: file_search
data.description: Search across files and vector stores connected to this relay.

query.description: Search query string describing what to look up in files or vector stores.

top_k.description: Maximum number of relevant chunks or documents to return.

filters.description: Optional metadata filters to narrow search results (e.g. file type, tags, or source).

data.name: code_interpreter
data.description: Execute Python code in a sandbox for calculations, data analysis, and other utilities.

files.description: Optional list of file IDs to make available in the runtime environment.

data.name: image_generation
data.description: Generate images using the OpenAI image generation API via this relay.

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired image.

response_format.description: Response format for the generated image(s), e.g. 'b64_json' or 'url'.

data.name: audio_transcription
data.description: Transcribe audio files or streams into text using OpenAI audio models.

file_id.description: File ID of the audio to transcribe.

language.description: Optional BCP-47 language code to bias transcription (e.g. 'en', 'id', 'en-US').

data.name: audio_generation
data.description: Generate speech or audio clips from text using OpenAI audio models.

data.name: vector_store_search
data.description: Search a vector store managed through this relay using embeddings.

vector_store_id.description: Identifier of the vector store to search.

query.description: Natural language query to embed and search against the vector store.

top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return.

filters.description: Optional metadata filters to narrow search results.

data.name: computer_use
data.description: High-level computer control actions (mouse, keyboard, application control) via an external agent.

action.description: Action to perform, for example 'click', 'type', 'open_app', 'scroll', etc.

arguments.description: Structured arguments for the action (coordinates, text, application id, etc.).

data.name: video_generation
data.description: Generate short videos using the upstream OpenAI video generation APIs via this relay.

prompt.description: Natural language description of the desired video content.

duration_seconds.description: Target duration of the video in seconds (approximate).

model.description: Video-capable model to use for generation.

data.name: realtime_session
data.description: Create a Realtime session descriptor that clients can use to establish a WebSocket connection via the OpenAI Realtime API.

instructions.description: Optional system-level instructions to apply to the realtime session.

session_ttl_seconds.description: Optional session lifetime hint in seconds, if supported.
